statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customer_data WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_id, age, location FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age, location FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, gender, location, age FROM customer_data WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7);
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, location, jsonb_array_length(purchase_history) AS num_purchases FROM customer_data WHERE jsonb_array_length(purchase_history) > 3 ORDER BY num_purchases DESC;
SELECT customer_name, gender, location FROM customer_data WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY customer_name ASC, age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, gender FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT name, age, location FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, location FROM customers WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE location='New York' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date <= '2023-01-01' AND end_date >= '2022-12-01' ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_demographic FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_demographic='Young Adults' ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM MarketingCampaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT segment_name, criteria FROM CampaignSegments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY income DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE income >= 50000 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, income FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE gender = 'Male' AND income < 70000;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM CampaignSegments WHERE LENGTH(criteria) > 100 ORDER BY segment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, gender, income FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT demographic_name, age_group, income_range FROM demographics WHERE age_group = '18-35';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, age, income FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_name, age, income FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY income DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, d.demographic_name, m.campaign_name FROM customers c INNER JOIN campaign_targets ct ON c.customer_id = ct.customer_id INNER JOIN demographics d ON ct.demographic_id = d.demographic_id INNER JOIN marketing_campaigns m ON ct.campaign_id = m.campaign_id;

SELECT c.customer_name, c.age, d.age_group, m.start_date, m.end_date FROM customers c INNER JOIN campaign_targets ct ON c.customer_id = ct.customer_id INNER JOIN demographics d ON ct.demographic_id = d.demographic_id INNER JOIN marketing_campaigns m ON ct.campaign_id = m.campaign_id WHERE d.income_range = 'High';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, age FROM Customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT segment_name FROM CustomerSegments ORDER BY segment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;
SELECT name, gender FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';

SELECT c.name, p.product_name, o.order_date FROM Customers c JOIN Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN Products p ON o.order_id = p.product_id WHERE p.price > 100 ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, cs.segment_name FROM Customers c JOIN SegmentAssignments sa ON c.customer_id = sa.customer_id JOIN CustomerSegments cs ON sa.segment_id = cs.segment_id WHERE sa.assign_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT cs.segment_name, COUNT(sa.customer_id) AS total_customers FROM CustomerSegments cs JOIN SegmentAssignments sa ON cs.segment_id = sa.segment_id GROUP BY cs.segment_name ORDER BY total_customers DESC;
